name: resetWhen
signature: { <Out>(f: Predicate<Out>): <In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>) => Schedule<Out, In, R>; <Out, In, R>(self: Schedule<Out, In, R>, f: Predicate<Out>): Schedule<Out, In, R>; }
description:
Resets the schedule when the specified predicate on the schedule output
evaluates to `true`.
*Details This function modifies a schedule so that it resets to its initial state
whenever the provided predicate `f` returns `true` for an output value.
documentation:
Resets the schedule when the specified predicate on the schedule output
evaluates to `true`.
*Details**

This function modifies a schedule so that it resets to its initial state
whenever the provided predicate `f` returns `true` for an output value.
